issue.title: [Java] Support Dictionary Encoding for binary type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5835](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5835). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now is not implemented because byte array is not supported to be HashMap key.

One possible way is that wrap them with something to implement equals and hashcode.

comments.body:
